name: AmyLogic Software
description:
AmyLogic is a digital agency focused on driving business success by creating extraordinary experiences for mobile and other connected devices. 
AmyLogic has designed, developed, and delivered applications across multiple platforms that engage and delight users while delivering on a business vision. 
In addition to mobile strategy, design and development, we create experiences for devices such as Apple Watch, IoT connected home appliances, and heads-up displays. We also offer application marketing services and ongoing application support and updates.  
Founded in 2014, we are currently 20+ designers, developers, producers and strategists, working collaboratively in cross-disciplinary teams under one roof in Jaipur, India.
